import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; const Events = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // ... your form data }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Send a POST request with the data to your API endpoint axios.post('http://localhost:3004/posts', formData) .then((response) => { // Handle the success response here console.log('Message sent successfully:', response.data); console.log(response.status) if (response.status === 201) { alert("Sign Up successful!"); history("/login"); } // Show a success alert Swal.fire({ icon: 'success', title: 'Event Created Successfully!', text: 'Your event has been created successfully.', }); }) .catch((error) => { // Handle any errors that occur during the request console.error('An error occurred while sending the message:', error); // Show an error alert Swal.fire({ icon: 'error', title: 'Error!', text: 'An error occurred while creating the event.', }); }); }; return (

Create Your Event!

setFormData({ ...formData, name_event: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, first_name: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, last_name: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, presenter: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, event_location: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, number_seats: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, name_event: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, ticket_price: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, photo: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, direction: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, additions: e.target.value })} />
setFormData({ ...formData, link_location: e.target.value })} />
); }; export default Events;
